TopicTitle: [RESOLVED] Loading screen freezes when launching the game

Articles.Content:
EDIT: Discovered that two framework/toolkit mods were installed. Uninstalling them resolved the issue.

---

Reported Version: v0.1.4 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 10 (22H2) | CPU: AMD Ryzen 7 5800X | GPU: Nvidia GeForce RTX 3080 10 GB | RAM: Corsair DDR4-3200 2x16 GB

 

On first load, the loading screen freezes at the step "Loading localizations from Addressables".

Attempted launching several times and verifying files on Steam.

 

Included Attachments:

Edited September 4, 2023 by Bobe
Added explanation for resolution
try reinstalling the game and make sure you dont have any mods to fix this, else i dont really know why it would be happening except for mods
As OP states, they don't have any mods. I am also experiencing this bug, and have never had any mods either.

Apologies, I was mistaken; I did have a mod installed that I was not aware of. I tried out Toucan a while ago which requires BepInEx, so by default, it had installed Space Warp + BepInEx and UITK.

Uninstalling them allowed the game to load correctly.

51 minutes ago, Bobe said:

Apologies, I was mistaken; I did have a mod installed that I was not aware of. I tried out Toucan a while ago which requires BepInEx, so by default, it had installed Space Warp + BepInEx and UITK.

Uninstalling them allowed the game to load correctly.

Thanks for that information. Moving to the archive.
